name: com.DreadZitoDev.SceneSlayerTool
description:
Scene Slayer Tool is a handy Unity editor extension that helps you organize and manage your project's scenes like a pro!
This tool is used to generate a list of scenes in the current project.
It is useful for projects that have a lot of scenes and need to keep track of them, or just to have a quick reference of all the scenes in the project.
